# File lib/i18n/backend/cldr.rb, line 48
        def detect_type(object, options)
          options.has_key?(:currency) ? :currency : case object
          when ::Numeric
            :decimal
          when ::Date, ::DateTime, ::Time
            object.class.name.downcase.to_sym
          else
            raise_unspecified_format_type!
          end
        end
